pages.text:
Magic staffs are upgrades to the caster's wand. While they loose the accelerate, staffs add levels of amplification to multiple effects within the spell. Effects will not be augmented further if they have dampen. The level of amplification, as well as the max amount of effects augmented, is increased with each staff tier. 
Note: a staff rework is coming sometime in the future, which will allow them to use all forms without loosing the extra spell slot functionality!
